front.title: A Web-Controlled Radio Broadcast Receiving and Monitoring System

abstract.t: Organisations such as BBC Monitoring monitor radio and televisionbroadcasts worldwide. Traditional monitoring methods incur expensiveinternational telephone call charges. This document describes asystem whereby remote broadcasts can be monitored using a computerconnected to a radio or television receiver and to the Internet,using inexpensive local calls to its local Internet Service Provider.This document also defines the protocol used between the centralserver and the remote clients which implement this system.
